Name: KADlancer
AboutMe:
Certified & qualified IT specialist and field-tested front end web developer.

"My name is Konrad Abe and I love building things."

I'm a web developer (born '82) living in Berlin and creating large and small websites and online solutions since 2006. Prior to this I worked on a privat web project and successfully completed my vocational training as an IT specialist between 2003 and 2006 at SIEMENS.

Professional: I'm a full time Web Developer since 2009, creating, extending and implementing websites with HTML, CSS and JavaScript. Whenever possible I love to work with new technologies and tools and I'm successfully applying HTML5, CSS3 and Responsive Web Design techniques or trying out new approaches to common problems.

During both my vocational and private projects I'm interested in topics like Responsive Web Design (mobile web), Usability, User Experience, Accessability as well as clean code, Web Standards, Web Best Practice and SEO Basics.
